description: Unique identifier for this migration mapping record.
Numeric phase grouping to orchestrate migration waves; earlier phases run first. Likely batches related asset data; confirm with SME.
Execution sequence number within a phase controlling when this step runs during fleet data migration.
Target table this migration step populates in the fleet management schema (e.g., assets, attributes, meters).
SQL FROM/WHERE clause defining the source dataset and filters for this migration step; likely references legacy UNIT entities; confirm with SME.
Flag: 1 when the step uses fixed values instead of sourcing from legacy fields; 0 otherwise.
Flag indicating this step updates existing target rows rather than inserting new ones.
Flag indicating the SELECT applies DISTINCT to deduplicate source records before loading.
User or service account that created this migration rule.
Date/time when this migration rule was created.
User or service account that last modified this migration rule.
Date/time of the most recent modification to this migration rule.
